articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play the Netherlands in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: India bat first against Netherlands in final group game

articles.description: Rob Key said he should be blamed "more than anyone" for England's failure at the World Cup because he prioritised Test matches over the 50-over format.
articles.title: World Cup exit my fault for focusing on Tests - Key

articles.description: Britain's Tom Aspinall knocks out Sergei Pavlovich in the first round to win the interim heavyweight title at UFC 295 in New York.
articles.title: Aspinall wins UFC interim title in 69 seconds

articles.description: Despite the narrative around Manchester United and Erik ten Hag, the Red Devils have now won four of their past five league games after victory over Luton.
articles.title: 'Ten Hag has space to breathe after win over Luton'

articles.description: Match of the Day's Jermaine Jenas analyses how Wolves came from behind to beat Tottenham, with a spectacular equaliser from Pablo Sarabia followed by Mario Lemina's winner.
articles.title: 'One of the best goals you'll see' - how Wolves saw off Spurs

articles.description: Megan Rapinoe suffers a painful end to her football career as the American star is forced to leave the pitch just three minutes into her farewell game.
articles.title: Injured Rapinoe forced to leave final game early

articles.description: Newcastle United defender Kieran Trippier says he told fans "there's no need to panic" when confronting them at full-time following their defeat at Bournemouth.
articles.title: Trippier confronts 'emotional' Newcastle fans after defeat

articles.description: Batter Ollie Pope and uncapped seamers John Turner and Josh Tongue are picked in a new-look England squad for the white-ball tour of West Indies.
articles.title: Pope & Crawley in new-look England white-ball squad

articles.description: Ghana striker Raphael Dwamena dies aged 28 after collapsing on the pitch during a league match in Albania.
articles.title: Ghana striker Dwamena dies after on-pitch collapse

articles.description: Virat Kohli is denied the chance to get a record 50th one-day international century by Roelof van der Merwe as India face Netherlands in their World Cup match in Bengaluru, India.
articles.title: 'Silence, shock!' - Kohli bowled by Van der Merwe
